original_solution_mapping.L1: Since Lucas makes 4 pieces of chocolate per student, he has 40 / 4 = <<40/4=10>>10 students.
original_solution_mapping.L2: This upcoming Monday, there will be 10 - 3 = <<10-3=7>>7 students.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Lucas will make 4 * 7 = <<4*7=28>>28 pieces of chocolate candy.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2391.
    Returns: the number of pieces of chocolate candy Lucas will make.
    """
    # L1
    pieces_per_student = 4 # 4 pieces of chocolate candy for each of his students
    total_pieces_last_monday = 40 # He made 40 pieces of chocolate candy last Monday
    num_students_last_monday = total_pieces_last_monday / pieces_per_student

    # L2
    students_not_coming = 3 # 3 of Lucas' students will not be coming to class
    num_students_this_monday = num_students_last_monday - students_not_coming

    # L3
    chocolate_candy_this_monday = pieces_per_student * num_students_this_monday

    # FA
    answer = chocolate_candy_this_monday
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Since Lucas makes {pieces_per_student} pieces of chocolate per student, he has {total_pieces_last_monday} / {pieces_per_student} = <<{total_pieces_last_monday}/{pieces_per_student}={num_students_last_monday}>>{num_students_last_monday} students.

This upcoming Monday, there will be {num_students_last_monday} - {students_not_coming} = <<{num_students_last_monday}-{students_not_coming}={num_students_this_monday}>>{num_students_this_monday} students.

Lucas will make {pieces_per_student} * {num_students_this_monday} = <<{pieces_per_student}*{num_students_this_monday}={chocolate_candy_this_monday}>>{chocolate_candy_this_monday} pieces of chocolate candy.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Since Lucas makes 4 pieces of chocolate per student, he has 40 / 4 = <<40/4=160>>160 students.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: This upcoming Monday, there will be 160 - 3 = <<160-3=157>>157 students.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Lucas will make 4 * 157 = <<4*157=628>>628 pieces of chocolate candy.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '*' instead.
